thread.title: Fed Executes Enforcement Action Against China Construction Bank
thread.title_full: Fed Executes Enforcement Action Against China Construction Bank - Bloomberg Business

author: Jesse Hamilton
title: Fed Executes Enforcement Action Against China Construction Bank
text:
China Construction Bank Corp., the worldâ€™s second-biggest bank by assets, was ordered to improve internal controls to guard against money laundering under an agreement with the Federal Reserve, the U.S. central bank said on Tuesday.
The Fed announced the enforcement action against the Chinese bank stemming from complaints about its New York branch, according to a statement.
